trans-unit.source:
The minimum width of the image should be not less than 1920px.
If the image height is set, the image will be cropped to this height and have the same height on different screens.
If the image height equals zero (default), the image will be scaled depending on screen size.

Above-the-fold images that are lazily loaded render later in the page lifecycle, which can delay the largest contentful paint.
It is recommended to skip lazy-loading for the HeroImage element.
